newsitem.title: MONGOLIA: MONGOLIA UNEMPLOYMENT UP 24.84 PCT END-JULY YR/YR.
newsitem.headline: MONGOLIA UNEMPLOYMENT UP 24.84 PCT END-JULY YR/YR.

text.p: Mongolia's unemployment rate soared 24.84 percent at the end of July from a year ago, according to official statistics available on Tuesday.
The number of unemployed reached 64,889 at end-July compared with 51,976 during the same period last year, the State Statistical Bulletin showed.
The figure rose 17.12 percent from the start of the year, when unemployment totalled 55,405.
The number of unemployed included only those registered with local employment offices.
"There are a large number of unregistered unemployed persons. Therefore data on unemployment is less than the actual situation," the bulletin said.
State statistics for 1996 showed the number of able-bodied people of working age was 1,086,700, of whom 791,800 were employed.
